name: Conscript's Thrust
description: A basic attack that anyone who picks up a spear could execute. Not to be used by anyone with decent experience with polearms.

name: Straight Thrust
description: A standard attack. Your basic option for dealing damage at low poise.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position

name: Quick Thrust
description: A fast attack. Your basic option to generate poise while dealing damage.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position

name: Heavy Thrust
description: A heavy attack. Your basic high poise damaging move.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Pinning Thrust
description: An attack aimed at the swordarm. A basic attack to impede the enemy's offense, offered early in the moveset.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* Target's next attack has -1 to hit

name: Perforating Thrust
description: An attack to drain speed. A basic poise damage move, offered early in the moveset.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position

name: Weakening Thrust
description: An attack to drain power. An alternative to Pinning Strike that weakens the enemy's damage instead of their accuracy.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position

name: Bannerwave
description: You hold up your banner and inspire yourself. Your strongest poise generation move available in the moveset.

name: Necrotic Thrust
description: A powerful blow that desecrates the body. A more powerful poise damaging move than Perforating Thrust if you have greater poise.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position

name: Disembowel
description: An attack that shreds an enemy's innards. A high poise attack with a chance to kill instantly.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage

name: Harrying Thrust
description: You move backwards while warding off the enemy advance. It's rare that you'll get the full benefit from this move, but when you do, it can leave you in an optimal position for later turns.
effects: * The target fails to maneuver forward this round

name: Fleeting Thrust
description: You dash backwards while holding off enemies. A stronger version of Harrying Thrust for increased mobility and damage.
effects: * The target fails to maneuver forward this round

name: Reaching Thrust
description: You move forward to attack. A basic forward mobility attack.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position

name: Charging Thrust
description: You charge forward. A strong forward mobility attack.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Paladin's Thrust
description: You attack from horseback. A basic low poise attack to use while mounted.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Cavalier's Thrust
description: You attack quickly from horseback. A basic poise generation attack to use while mounted.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Ride and Thrust
description: You use the speed of your horse to attack while repositioning. A strong mobility option for mounted polearm users.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* You maneuver 1 line forward or backward

name: Give Chase
description: You harry an enemy as they move. A strong option to chase an enemy retreating backward.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* Until the end of the round, an enemy damaged by this move that maneuvers backward for any reason allows you to maneuver forward the same number of lines if you choose to do so

name: Canter
description: An attack that evokes the fast and evasive moves of your mount. A more powerful version of Pinning Strike available to mounted polearm users.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* The target has -2 to hit for attacks directed at you until the end of the round

name: Jousting Lance
description: You charge forward for the kill with the great speed of your horse helping your power output. A strong high poise move available to mounted polearm users.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage

name: Valkyrie Thrust
description: You attack from high up. A great way to reach for the backline if you can manage to gain high ground.
additional_requirements: * You have a height advantage over your target
effects: * This attack is made with two levels of advantage

name: Entrenched Thrust
description: An attack with easy access to the legs. A decent move to impede an enemy when you find yourself in low ground.
additional_requirements: * Your target has a height advantage over you
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage
* Target's next attack has -1 to hit

name: Piercing Thrust
description: An attack that pierces the first enemy to hit a second. A basic AOE attack that is improved by polearm's superior reach.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* This attack also hits a second target in the line behind the initial target

name: Farstrike Thrust
description: An attack that reaches for an enemy in the back. A great option for dealing damage to an otherwise hard-to-reach enemy.
effects: * This attack ignores all positional disadvantage and instead has one level of advantage if your target is in the backline

name: Stunning Thrust
description: An attack that can stun an unsuspecting foe. A basic stunning attack if you're lucky.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position

name: Headhunter Thrust
description: An attack aimed at the fastest enemy. A strong way to deal with a high poise enemy if you have good timing.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* If the target has the highest poise amongst all combatants, this attack deals +2d8 damage.

name: Shredding Thrust
description: An attack that shreds at the foe's armor. A great way to deal with tanky enemies.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* This attack deals +2d8 and inflicts -2 AC until the end of the next round if the target is wearing heavy armor

name: Faltering Thrust
description: An attack that weakens defenses. A somewhat late offering to lower a target's AC.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* Target has -1 AC until the end of the next round

name: Javelin Toss
description: An attack with a thrown spear. An AOE attack powered by the accuracy of the polearm
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* This attack hits one target in each line

name: Kingslayer
description: A powerful attack aimed at their most protected unit. A strong move to use against backline enemies.
effects: * This attack ignores all positional disadvantage and instead has one level of advantage if your target is in the backline
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage

name: Spear of the Desert
description: An attack that invokes the power of the desert. If you're in a desert biome, this attack can control an enemy's poise generation very well.
additional_requirements: * You are in a desert biome
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* Target cannot gain poise until the end of the next round

name: Spear of the Frostguard
description: An attack that invokes the power of the tundra. A good way to control enemy movement if you're in a tundra biome
additional_requirements: * You are in a tundra biome
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* Target cannot maneuver or be maneuvered until the end of the next round

name: Swordbreaker
description: An attack that shows the reach advantage of the lance over the sword. A good way to counter enemy longblade users.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* This attack has +1 to hit and +2d8 damage if the target wields a longblade

name: Fishing Thrust
description: You stab at the water's surface with incredible accuracy. A great way to defeat enemies who are hiding underwater.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* This attack ignores cover from hiding underwater

name: Spellbreaker
description: An attack that pierces through magic. A strong attack to deal with enemies who are buffed by mages.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position

* This attack deals +2d8 damage if the target is benefitting from a spell effect. Additionally, it causes one spell effect on the target to immediately end (if there are multiple, one is randomly chosen)

name: Willbreaker
description: An attack that capitalizes on the gap in an enemy line made when one dies. A great follow up if your team manages to finish off a frontline enemy.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* If an enemy in the frontline died this round, this attack gains +2d8 damage and also gains the following:
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Line of Pikes
description: An attack that punishes forward advances. If you anticipate that one or more enemies will maneuver forward, this move punishes their forward movement.
effects: * Until the end of the round, you automatically attack any enemy that maneuvers forward, dealing 2d8 damage on a hit.
* The damage from these attacks are increased by +2d8 if the maneuvering enemy is mounted

name: Sweeping Attack
description: An attack to fish out hiding enemies. A great counter to enemies frequently hiding behind cover.

name: Grievous Thrust
description: An attack effective against enemies attempting to recover. A unique anti-healing attack that can help prevent enemies from undoing your party's hard work.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* Target cannot benefit from healing until the end of the next round

name: Bringer of Frailty
description: An attack that exploits enemy weaknesses. A unique attack that has good base power and can extend the duration of your other effects on the target with some luck.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* On Attack Roll of 11 or 12 - The duration of negative effects on the target is extended by 1 round

name: Sapping Thrust
description: An attack that drains momentum. An attack that generates poise and also damages the target's poise.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position

name: Cobra Thrust
description: An attack that exploits an enemy's strong momentum. This attack gets stronger against higher poise enemies. It does not mix well with your poise damaging moves.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* This attack has +1 to hit and +1d8 damage for every 25 poise the target has

name: Jesting Thrust
description: An attack that requires some luck. A poise damaging move with some randomness involved. About half of the time it should be more efficient than other poise damaging moves you have.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* The target loses poise equal to the rolled value times 5

name: Disarming Thrust
description: An attack that exploits an enemy's superior position. This move can keep frontline enemies from gaining advantage for their attacks, or counter an enemy polearm user. Note that it is ineffective against ranged weapon users.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* Target's next attack has 1 level of disadvantage

name: Askance Thrust
description: An attack that slips past shields. A counter to enemies meeting you with shields.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* This attack ignores AC granted by shields
* This attack has +2d8 damage if the target wields a shield

name: Demoralizing Thrust
description: An attack against a support. A powerful counter to enemies who are mostly supporting other enemies.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* If the target used a move that provides a benefit to another enemy this round, this attack deals an additional +2d8 damage

name: Guardbreaker
description: An attack strong against tanks. A great way to chip at the frontline.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* This attack has +1d8 damage and inflicts -1 AC and -1 to hit on the target if the target is in the frontline

name: Exploiting Thrust
description: An attack that takes advantage of a stunned enemy. A great follow up to an ally landing a stun.
effects: * If the target is stunned, this attack cannot miss and has +2d8 damage

name: Lance of Longinus
description: A mythical attack to bring gods to their knees. An attack with many effects to use at high poise, for the indecisive polearm user.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* Until the end of the next round, the target has -1 to hit, -1D damage, and -1 AC

name: Gae Bolg Ionsai
description: A legendary attack by a master of the spear. A powerful poise damaging move that can only be used once per day.
effects: * This attack is made with one level of advantage unless you are in a special position
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage
* Target loses poise equal to the damage roll of this move
* Until the end of the round, all damage that the target takes causes them to lose an equal amount of poise
